1513700.name: Pond Scum
1513700.description:
Eat, kill and Reproduce.....and sacrifice your young to find a better place to live!

In Pond Scum You are a single celled organism, being small your life is very short. The clock is ticking. You must constantly consume in order to survive. You are not alone and will need to fight for food and the right to proceed. Of course the point of living comes reproduction. When you eat enough you can spawn eggs, these eggs need to be cared for and protected and if done right will hatch into others like you and will join you in the fight for survival. Strength in numbers increases your chances to survive. However...... In order to find a more suitable place to live you must give up your offspring....
